Header: 68 Division Troops Serve Meals to the Deaf & Blind
Content: In the hope of sharing sentiments of goodwill and understanding, 68 Division troops using their own resources provided breakfast, lunch and dinner to resident children and staffers at Iniya Walwu Illam School for the Deaf and Blind on Saturday (2). A group of 8 Army personnel, led by an officer took part in the community project and served those meals to children as well as the staffers in the School for children with special needs.
